name: Codegrid
description:
Codegrid is a multiplayer puzzle strategy game that aims for improve player's typing speed and multi-perspective thinking.

The game is currently in development and only Singleplayer mode is available.

Instructions:

  • Enter to open command console to type input.
  • W, A, S, D to move camera.
  • move up, move down, move left, move right to move your character.
  • check hp to check your remaining HP. Once your HP reached 0, the game ends.
  • Items that recovers HP and lose HP will randomly spawn in the grid.
